title: Synching bookmarks from my Mac to my iPhone
content: After synching from my Mac to my iPhone, the bookmarks on my iPhone are bare. There aren't nearly as many as there are on my Mac. But, in looking at Firefox on my iPhone, I honestly don't see where synch is even turned on there.
creator: pb4072

title: starting Firefox results in multiple instances of it starting with each asking to exit the others. If say yes to exit, another instance starts.
content: starting Firefox results in multiple instances of it starting with each asking to exit the others. If say yes to exit, another instance starts.
creator: Philip357
